title: 'Not what we voted for': Tariffs expose cracks in Trump coalition
shortDescription: Elon Musk, Bill Ackman, Joe Rogan and Dave Portnoy have all sounded off in the Trump tariff debate.

title: Trump wants trading partners' input on great deals, Hassett says
shortDescription: White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett downplayed concerns over President Donald Trump's tariffs, saying Trump will listen to proposals for deals.

title: President Trump says tariffs are 'medicine'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spent the weekend at a golf tournament in Florida as the stock market continued to plunge.

title: Exclusive: Iran-backed militias in Iraq ready to disarm to avert Trump wrath
shortDescription: Several powerful Iranian-backed militia groups in Iraq are prepared to disarm to avert the threat of an escalating conflict with the Trump administration, 10 senior commanders and Iraqi officials told Reuters.

title: Book ban at military service academies draws flak from Congress
shortDescription: The Pentagon has worked to implement President Donald Trump’s directive to eliminate materials that could be viewed as advancing DEI.

title: Trump digs in amid market woes: 'Sometimes you have to take medicine'
shortDescription: President Trump defended his massive tariffs that have rattled the markets, telling reporters "sometimes you have to take medicine to fix something.”

title: Trump attorney general says she's received death threats over Mangione case
shortDescription: Attorney General Pam Bondi said on Sunday she has received death threats for seeking the death penalty in the case of Luigi Mangione.

title: Trump official says there's 'no reason' to anticipate recession based on tariffs
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent also said more than 50 nations had started negotiations with the U.S. since last Wednesday's tariff rollout.

title: Democrat vows to file impeachment articles
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green from Texas, who filed impeachment articles against President Trump during his first term, is vowing to do it again within the month.

title: Trump's biggest gamble: Tariffs test his presidency, and the world
shortDescription: A White House policy decision – not the emergence of a deadly virus or a terrorist attack – has shaken the global order. What happens next?

title: 'We knew there would be uncertainty': Trump officials address stock market hit
shortDescription: Some of Donald Trump's top officials were pressed on the stock market's hits since the president unveiled wide-reaching tariffs.

title: 'A lot of penguins': Trump official pressed on tariffs against uninhabited islands
shortDescription: The White House has said the Heard and McDonald Islands will be hit with a 10% tariff.

title: Dem who shouted at Trump during joint address vows to file impeachment articles
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green, R-Texas, committed on Saturday to file impeachment articles against President Donald Trump within the next 30 days.

title: This immigrant voted for Trump. His family may lose legal status.
shortDescription: Biden offered humanitarian protections during a period of record migration. Now Trump is revoking their status.

title: Are some of Trump's firings setting up a Supreme Court case?
shortDescription: How much power does the president have? Donald Trump says independent agencies should answer to him.

title: Trump administration revokes all visas held by South Sudanese
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the U.S. is revoking all visas held by South Sudanese passport holders for failing to accept repatriated citizens.

title: Trump tells Americans to 'hang tough' as universal tariffs take effect
shortDescription: President Trump on Saturday urged Americans to "hang tough" and played golf as his baseline 10% universal tariffs went into effect.

title: Anti-Trump protests organize across the world
shortDescription: The “Hands Off” protests across the country are expected to be the largest anti-Trump demonstrations since he began his second term.

title: Trump, Netanyahu to meet Monday to talk Gaza war, tariffs
shortDescription: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu and President Trump will meet Monday at the White house, their second in-person meeting since Trump's inauguration.

title: 'Probably unconstitutional': Trump tariffs spotlight GOP fault lines
shortDescription: Trump's massive tariffs have sparked a debate on the political right but most Republican voters are sticking with the president
